
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(contrib-restricted-libiscsi)
target_compile_options(contrib-restricted-libiscsi PRIVATE
  -DHAVE_CONFIG_H
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(contrib-restricted-libiscsi PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib
)
target_link_libraries(contrib-restricted-libiscsi PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
)
target_sources(contrib-restricted-libiscsi PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/connect.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/crc32c.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/discovery.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/init.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/iscsi-command.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/logging.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/login.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/md5.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/nop.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/pdu.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/scsi-lowlevel.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/socket.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/sync.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/restricted/libiscsi/lib/task_mgmt.c
)
